name: Laravel + Node Dev
postCreateCommand: cd apps/api && composer install || true && cd ../web && npm install || true
postAttachCommand: bash -lc ' cd apps/api && [ -f .env ] || { [ -f .env.example ] && cp .env.example .env; } && php artisan key:generate --ansi && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8000 & cd ../../apps/web && npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000 '
